item.title: Paysign Inc 10-K
item.description: Paysign Inc, which is in the Services-Business Services, Nec [7389] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 23, 2022 had 18074 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 167 instances financial - 159 instances stock - 152 instances 2021 - 152 instances card - 151 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
